metadata.name: The Last Thread
metadata.description: As the spider took its last breath in his palm, a sudden realization hit him. He finally understood the immense sacrifices that come with living the life of an artist in a world that often fails to appreciate their work. The weight of this realization was crushing, as he felt the weight of every obstacle and hardship he had faced in pursuit of his passion. With newfound clarity, he saw that art is the thread that binds the world together, an unbreakable bond that connects people across every border and boundary.
